attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the goverment is surpposer to run the country. NOT too control peoples lives. This is too petition Gordon Browm too stand down and too call on him too hold a genral election imediatley. Gordown Brown has not been elected by the people he has no right too govern this country or its citizens.
